about_the_game:
DEMO NOTICE: 

Experience the prequel chapter of our upcoming game! While we're still early in development and gameplay elements may evolve, your feedback and suggestions will help shape the final product. Thank you for being part of our journey!

Sunny Side Crossing is a story-rich restaurant simulation game with a mix of slice-of-life elements set in a unique world. Step into the roles of a newlywed couple who just inherited a restaurant. As you and your spouse divide responsibilities between sourcing ingredients and running the restaurant, unexpected surprises and secrets await. Immerse yourself in a captivating blend of love, food, and adventures in Sunny Side Crossing.

With the passing of the old restaurant owner, the mood of the village has changed. Help restore the villagers' spirits by unlocking and cooking their favorite dishes, and watch the village grow.

Embark on adventures and explore different locations to hunt, fish, gather, and buy ingredients for your menu or upgrades for the restaurant. Alternate your ingredients and dishes as the seasons change to avoid overfarming.

Join expeditions with the villagers to hunt various animals and monsters for fresh ingredients. Each villager has unique skills—use them strategically for a successful hunt. The more dangerous the hunt, the bigger the rewards.

Cook delicious meals, serve guests, and unlock new recipes as you progress through the game. Each meal preparation will feature a simple mini-game that affects how your dish tastes. Master various cooking skills and become the best chef in the country.

Interact and make friends with the villagers. Sometimes they will ask for help with their problems, and nothing is better than a dish prepared with love to comfort them! Take part in the village festival and celebrate the seasons with everyone.

The world of Sunny Side Crossing is inspired by diverse cultures, reflected in the food, outfit, characters, and more. Customize your restaurant and house with tons of decorative items to create the restaurant and home of your dreams.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E4500 @ 2.2GHz or AMD Athlon 64 X2 5600+ @ 2.8 GHz
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: DirectX 11-compatible graphics card with at least 1GB of video memory
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

short_description: A story-rich restaurant sim with slice-of-life RPG elements. Play as a newlywed couple inheriting a restaurant. Share duties with your spouse, from sourcing ingredients to managing the restaurant. Explore the world of Sunny Side Crossing through interactions with neighbors and customers.
